job_details.Functieomschrijving:
We're looking for a developer to join our new team. This team is working on a product that utilizes generative AI technology to support healthcare providers in their logistical processes.

   Your main challenge is to collaborate with the team to translate these new technologies into a user-friendly and effective product. You will work together with our UX designer/researcher, front-end developer, and other team members to quickly develop prototypes. In doing so, you may need to be willing to accept less elegant or scalable solutions for rapid, testable delivery. Based on user testing, we then iteratively improve these prototypes. We are seeking someone with backend and API development experience who likes to go the extra mile. We are looking for curiosity, problem-solving skills, and the willingness to learn and implement new technologies.

   Depending on your experience, a combination with a more leadership role within the new team is also a possibility.

Your team

   Your team is a multidisciplinary product team within the Data Science group. The team consists of a UX designer/researcher and software developers with various specializations. You will be building a new product from scratch, where the team itself is responsible for using an iterative, exploratory process to discover how to leverage new technologies like generative AI and conversational agents to support healthcare workers with logistical challenges. In the long term, the experiences and insights gained from this product will form the foundation for the application of these advanced technologies across all of our products. You can also apply your knowledge more broadly within the Data Science group, allowing you to contribute not only to exploratory work but also to improving or expanding existing solutions., "The most of what I get out of my work is the unique freedom given to grow and to develop. I truly am an entrepreneur in our own market group. Initiatives are appreciated and we are all trusted with picking it up and to actually carrying it out together."
job_details.full_text:
Software Developer

We're looking for a developer to join our new team. This team is working on a product that utilizes generative AI technology to support healthcare providers in their logistical processes.

   Your main challenge is to collaborate with the team to translate these new technologies into a user-friendly and effective product. You will work together with our UX designer/researcher, front-end developer, and other team members to quickly develop prototypes. In doing so, you may need to be willing to accept less elegant or scalable solutions for rapid, testable delivery. Based on user testing, we then iteratively improve these prototypes. We are seeking someone with backend and API development experience who likes to go the extra mile. We are looking for curiosity, problem-solving skills, and the willingness to learn and implement new technologies.

   Depending on your experience, a combination with a more leadership role within the new team is also a possibility.

Your team

   Your team is a multidisciplinary product team within the Data Science group. The team consists of a UX designer/researcher and software developers with various specializations. You will be building a new product from scratch, where the team itself is responsible for using an iterative, exploratory process to discover how to leverage new technologies like generative AI and conversational agents to support healthcare workers with logistical challenges. In the long term, the experiences and insights gained from this product will form the foundation for the application of these advanced technologies across all of our products. You can also apply your knowledge more broadly within the Data Science group, allowing you to contribute not only to exploratory work but also to improving or expanding existing solutions., "The most of what I get out of my work is the unique freedom given to grow and to develop. I truly am an entrepreneur in our own market group. Initiatives are appreciated and we are all trusted with picking it up and to actually carrying it out together."

profile_classification.rationale: The job description emphasizes building user-facing products that leverage generative AI technology, specifically mentioning conversational agents and the iterative development of prototypes. It highlights collaboration with UX designers and front-end developers, backend and API development, and the need to quickly develop and test solutions. The core focus is on translating new generative AI technologies into a functional product, aligning with the definition of a GenAI Engineer who designs, develops, and deploys applications built on generative models.

job_tasks.justification: The role involves 'backend and API development experience' and 'quickly develop prototypes' which are core software development activities to build user-facing applications.
The description mentions collaborating with 'UX designer/researcher, front-end developer' to 'quickly develop prototypes', indicating a focus on building and integrating software components.
job_tasks.phrase: collaborate with the team to translate these new technologies into a user-friendly and effective product

job_tasks.justification: The iterative improvement of prototypes based on user testing is a software development lifecycle activity.
The team is exploring 'how to leverage new technologies like generative AI and conversational agents', which directly relates to working with and adapting generative models.
job_tasks.phrase: leverage new technologies like generative AI and conversational agents

job_tasks.justification: The role supports 'healthcare providers in their logistical processes' and aims to 'support healthcare workers with logistical challenges', indicating a need to understand the business domain.
job_tasks.phrase: support healthcare providers in their logistical processes

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'application of these advanced technologies across all of our products' and 'improving or expanding existing solutions' suggests a long-term view of deployment and maintenance, which falls under operations.
job_tasks.phrase: application of these advanced technologies across all of our products

soft_skills.phrase: willingness to learn and implement new technologies
entrepreneur in our own market group. Initiatives are appreciated and we are all trusted with picking it up and to actually carrying it out together.
willing to accept less elegant or scalable solutions for rapid, testable delivery
